unnormalised: Bharoti lokank bharti sondorbhan internetache kitlem mahatvachem asa?
normalised: Bharoti-antlea dor eklean zanno zaye mhonn internet-ache kaim sadharonn utram kitem?

unnormalised: Bharotant internetacho vapor vaddo lagla, ani somanya internet utram samzun ghene hem khub gorjechem zata. Sukhepak data yojana ani smartphone-achea vaparant vadd zal'lean, thoddi shikxon mell'lea lokan-i digital jagant vadd keli asa. Internet surakshit ani yogy ritin vaprunk hi thoddi utram khub upyogi poddteli.
normalised: Bharotant internet-achem prasar vaddoit asa, sadharonn internet-ache utram somzun gheunchem odhik mahatvachem zata. Porvoddoi mellpi data plan-am ani smartphone-acho vapor vaddoit asa, thoddea formal xikxonn aslole lokui dijital sonvsarant vaddta vaddta bhag gheta. Hanga kaim avoxyak utram dileant zaka bharti-ank internet-ant probhavi ani surakshit ravonk xokta.

unnormalised: Poile, "URL" samzun gheiat, zache puro arth Uniform Resource Locator. Hem ek internetacher khas pannachem vo vostunchem web address asta. Dukhanache digital address mhonn chintun gheiat. Udaharonnak, https://www.irctc.co.in hi Indian Railway Catering and Tourism Corporation website-chi URL asa.
normalised: Poilem, "U-R-L" mhonnlear Uniform Resource Locator-achi vollokh korun gheiat. Hem mulbhootponnan internet-acher ek nirdisht panachem vo sadhanachem web address asa. Tem ek bazarantlea dukhana-chem digital address mhonn chintun gheiat. Udharonnak, H-T-T-P-S colon slash slash W-W-W dot I-R-C-T-C dot C-O dot I-N hem Indian Railway Catering and Tourism Corporation website-achem U-R-L asa.

unnormalised: Dusrem, "Wi-Fi" samzun ghene khub gorjechem. Wi-Fi ek wireless networking technology asa ji smartphone, laptop ani tablet sarkhea vostunk internetak kabel nastana zoddta. Zaiter cafe, restaurant ani ghoram atam Wi-Fi hotspot ditat. Tumkam zaiteak zagear "Free Wi-Fi available here" board dista. Ek samanya Wi-Fi router 2.4 GHz vo 5 GHz frequency bandacher cholta.
normalised: Uprant, "Wi-Fi" somzun gheunchem mahatvachem. Wi-Fi ek wireless networking technology asa jem smartphone, laptop, ani tablet sarkilea vostunk cable nastana internet-ak zoddunk dita. Soddeak café, restaurant, ani ghoram atam Wi-Fi hotspot dita. Tumchea lagim “Fukott Wi-Fi hanga upolbdh asa” mhonn chitram dista zatunch zageancher. Ek typikal Wi-Fi router don point char G-H-Z vo panch G-H-Z frequency band-ancher chalunk xokta.

unnormalised: "ISP" vo Internet Service Provider hem utram khub mahatvachem asa. Hi company tumkam internet vaporpak dita, jeo Jio, Airtel ani BSNL. Tumcho dor mhoinyacho bill Rs. 499 vo Rs. 799 tumchea ISP-ak vota.
normalised: “I-S-P” vo Internet Service Provider mhonnche utorui mahatvachem asa. Hea compeneo tumkam internet-ak provas divpi, zoxe Jio, Airtel, ani B-S-N-L. Tumchea moineachem bill rupia char xe nnovadve vo rupia sat xe nnovadve tumchea I-S-P-ak zata.

unnormalised: Ani, "Download" ani "Upload." Downloading mhonnje internetantle data tumchea vostuk transfer korop, ek Bollywood song vo movie download korun. Uploading mhonnje tumchea vostuntle data internetak transfer korop, tumcho family photo Facebook-ar vo video YouTube-ar upload korun. Yead dovrat ki 50 Mbps download speeds atam samanya zata.
normalised: Uprant, “Download” ani “Upload” asa. Downloading mhonnlear internet-antlem data tumchea device-ant haddop, zoxe ek Bollywood geet vo film download korop. Uploading, mhonnlear tumchea device-antlem data internet-ak haddop, zoxe family photo Facebook-ak vo video YouTube-ak upload korop. Yaad dovortat ki download speed panchavonn M-B-P-S atam sadharonn zata.

unnormalised: "Phishing" anik ek gorjechem utram asa, khas korun online surakxesthiti khatir. Hem dhokheche proyatn assa, je tumche username, password ani credit card details gheunk visvassu konn mhonn dakoun korta. Tumchea bank details magtelea emails vo messages-anchim zatalin asto; "SBI"-ntlean tumcho OTP magtalo message khatren choukash kortolo. Tumcho OTP, vo One-Time Password kednaich konnak diunakat.
normalised: “Phishing”ui anik ek mahatvachem utor, khas korun online suraksha khatir. Tem dhokhebaz prayatnank sandrbh dita zantunt usernames, passwords, ani credit card-achea mahitichea sarkea sankxem mahiti mellovnk ek visvas ghevnchea astitvacho bhes ghevnche. Tumchea bank-achea mahitichea vicharnneachea email-amni vo message-amni zannvai dovrat; “S-B-I” koddlean tumchea O-T-P-achi vichar korpi message-ak zannvayechea bhashen vaprat. Tumchea O-T-P, vo One-Time Password-ak kednanch vanttun divonk naka.

unnormalised: Shevttim, "VPN" kitem asa, ani tem kitem korta, samzun ghene khub gorjechem zata. VPN mhonnje Virtual Private Network. Hi ek service asa ji internetacher ek surakshit connection toyar korta, zaiter tumchi online privacy rakhunk ani tumchea zagear bandh astalea content-ak vaporunk vaporta. Zaite VPNs vaportat bandh kelelya website-ank vaporunk. Zaite VPNs melltat, kaim fukot ani kaim poddde ditat; ek visvassu VPN subscription tumkam dor mhoinyak sumar $5 poddtolo.
normalised: Xevttak, ek “V-P-N” kitem tem somzun gheunchem, ani tem kitem korta, hem vaddta vaddta mahatvachem zata. V-P-N mhonnlear Virtual Private Network. Ti ek seva ji internet-acher ek surakshit zoddnni toyar korta, chodd korun tumchi online guptota rakhonk ani tumchea pradeshat band aspi content-ak provas divnk vaprota. Zaitim band keloleo websites-ak provas divnk V-P-N-s vaportat. Zaitim upolbdh asat, thoddim fukott ani thoddim paisseanchem; ek visvas ghevnchem V-P-N subscription tumkam dollar panch dor moineak poddot.

unnormalised: Hi samanya internet utram samzun gheun, Bharoti nagrik internetacho puro vapor gheunk xaktat ani surakshit ravunk xaktat vadto astalea digital jagant. Eka desant zai 4G ani 5G connection vegim vaddta, digital shikxon atam sukh nhoi, punn khub gorjechem asa.
normalised: Hea sadharonn internet-achea utramni vollokh asun, bharti nagrik internet-achem purnn xakti vapurunk xokta ani ek vaddte dijital sonvsarant surakshit ani mahitichi ravonk xokta. Ek desant zaka char G ani panch G connectivity vegim vaddta, dijital xikxan atam ek aaram nasun, ek goroz asa.
